SELECT
    LocationID as locationId,
    service_zone as serviceZone
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@nyctaxistorageadls2.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
            FORMAT = 'CSV',
            PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
            HEADER_ROW=TRUE
        )
        with (LocationID  SMALLINT,
            Borough VARCHAR(100),
            Zone VARCHAR(100),
            service_zone VARCHAR(100)) AS result

-- read data from a file without header

SELECT
    *
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@nyctaxistorageadls2.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
            FORMAT = 'CSV',
            PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
        )
        with (LocationID  SMALLINT,
            Borough VARCHAR(100),
            Zone VARCHAR(100),
            service_zone VARCHAR(100)) AS result

-- use ordinal position to define the position of columns in the csv without headers

SELECT
    *
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@nyctaxistorageadls2.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
            FORMAT = 'CSV',
            PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
        )
        with (
            Zone VARCHAR(100) 3,
            service_zone VARCHAR(100) 4,
            Borough VARCHAR(100) 2) AS nyc_taxi_zone

-- Use External Data Source for better designing of project and simplification of queries:
-- can only be defined in custome database and not in master database

create EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data_raw
with (
    LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@nyctaxistorageadls2.dfs.core.windows.net/raw'
)

SELECT
    *
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
            DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
            FORMAT = 'CSV',
            PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
            FIRST_ROW=2
        )
        with (location_id  SMALLINT 1,
            borough VARCHAR(100) 2,
            zone VARCHAR(100) 3,
            service_zone VARCHAR(100) 4
            ) AS [result]

select * from sys.external_data_sources
